div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1130 Cherronesus environs (near mod. Se- vastopol'), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1944 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 39+ AR, 701 + AE. Pot hoard Cherronesus: 2 tetradr. (as Minns, pl. 4, 13) 22 didr. (as Zograph, pl. 36, 2 [5]; BMC 1 [17]) 15 dr. (as BMC 2) 701 AE (as Zograph, pl. 35, 16 [130]; BMC 6 [283], 7-8 [288]) (coins with variant types, different magistrates, ctmks.) Disposition: Sevastopol' Strzhletskii, KhSb 4 (1948), pp. 105-12 â€ Takhtai, KhSb 4 (1948), pp. 113-25
